stats.heading: Why Blogging?
stats.description: A blog can become either a means of earning money, or a great way to popularize your activity or brand through promotion via the Internet.

first.name: Anna Petrova
first.role: Journalist @ Editorial Office of Vogue magazine
first.body: I became a fan of this blog from the very first lines. Such honest and heartfelt thoughts. I always feel inspired and positive after reading a new article. Thank you for sharing your world with us!

second.name: Dmitry Ivanov
second.body: There is nothing better than reading a note that seems to have been written especially for you. This blog always gives me a boost for reflection and helps me stay inspired. Thank you for helping us love reading blogs!
